content: hand in hand cowl 2 0 shown in spincycle yarns dyed in the wool and dimond laine birdie hand in hand cowl 2 0 by jennifer evans for the lamb & kid our second version of our hand in hand cowl pattern continues the celebration of yarns that work well together this cowl is a deceptively simple two-color garter stitch piece with a touch of shaping that allows it to sit just right around your neck -- perfect for your stash of lightweight and fluffy yarns finished measurements approx 26 / 66 cm circumference at bottom tapering to 18 / 46 cm circumference at top x 13 5 20 5 / 34 52 cm tall
